entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
